about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Nature's Heritage Meets Luxury
about.philosophyDesc1: Amidst the hustle and bustle of modern life, Taman Wisata Bougenville exists as an exclusive escape just 2 hours from Jakarta. We believe that true luxury is not about artificial grandeur, but intimacy with nature, precious silence, and quality moments with loved ones.
about.philosophyDesc2: Every corner of Bougenville is designed to bring you closer to nature, family, and yourself. Discover authentic luxury in the midst of ancient pine forests at the foot of Mount Puntang.
about.valueHeritageDesc: Preserving the spirit of the Nagara Puntang Kingdom through architecture that respects nature and sincere Sundanese hospitality.
about.valueSustainabilityDesc: Farm-to-table concept with organic ingredients from our own garden. We are committed to eco-friendly practices.
about.valueAuthenticityDesc: A sincere experience, without pretense. From the warm welcome of our staff to the details of solid teak interiors.
about.valueCommunityDesc: Empowering the local community through hospitality training and partnerships with surrounding farmers.
about.historyDesc1: Centuries ago, the "Nagara Puntang" Kingdom stood majestically on this land. A kingdom known for its harmony with nature and wisdom in managing mountain resources.
about.historyDesc2: We keep that spirit alive through architecture that respects nature and sincere Sundanese hospitality. Each villa is designed with the philosophy of "blending with nature without changing it"—a philosophy practiced by our ancestors for hundreds of years.
about.historyDesc3: Mount Puntang is not just a place. It is a witness to history, a guardian of tradition, and home to generations who care for this ancient pine forest with all their hearts.
about.responsibilityDesc: As a resort in the heart of the mountains, we have a responsibility to protect the ecosystem that sustains this beauty. Bougenville adheres to the "leave no trace" principle and dedicates 30% of the land to forest conservation.
about.ctaDesc: We invite you to be part of our story. Book your stay today.

resto.heroSubtitle: Bale Puntang — Where Mountain Meets Culinary Excellence
resto.story1Title: By the clear waters of Cigeureuh River
resto.story1Desc: Bale Puntang brings the warmth of classic wooden interiors with the cool nature of Mount Puntang. Choose a cozy atmosphere indoors with vintage roofing or enjoy the fresh air in the outdoor area while listening to the gurgling river.
resto.story2Title: Authentic Taste with a Modern Twist
resto.story2Desc: Every dish—from signature menus to biting spicy sambal—is made from selected local ingredients. We highlight authentic flavors with modern presentation, telling the rich Sundanese culinary tradition in every plate.
resto.story3Desc: Bale Puntang is ready to be a venue for gatherings, meetings, social gathering, or small parties with an exclusive touch. Sit back on antique wooden benches, feel the serenity of nature while chatting and creating unforgettable moments.

values.title: Fresh from the Source
values.desc: We believe that the best flavors come from nature itself. Our vegetables are harvested directly from our own gardens, and our spices are sourced from local Puntang farmers.

hero.label: Our Commitment
hero.title: Harmony with Nature
hero.description: We don’t just exist in nature; we are part of it. Our mission is to preserve the beauty of Mount Puntang for generations to come.

message.quote: Leave nothing but footprints, take nothing but pictures.
message.body: At Taman Wisata Bougenville, luxury and sustainability go hand in hand. We believe that true hospitality means caring for our guests and our home—the earth. From protecting the Cigeureuh river to empowering our local Sundanese community, every decision we make is rooted in respect for the environment.

conservation.title: Forest Conservation
conservation.desc: We actively protect over 5 hectares of pine forest and native vegetation, ensuring a safe habitat for local biodiversity such as the Javan Eagle.

water.title: Water Stewardship
water.desc: The Cigeureuh river is our lifeline. We implement strict strict 'no-chemical' zones near waterways and treat all wastewater biologically.

waste.title: Responsible Waste
waste.desc: We aim for zero-waste-to-landfill. Organic waste is composted for our gardens, and recyclables are processed by local partners.

community.title: Community Empowerment
community.desc: Over 80% of our staff are from local villages. We prioritize local farmers and artisans for our kitchen and decor needs.

plastic.label: Green Initiative
plastic.title: Towards Plastic-Free
plastic.description: We are phasing out single-use plastics across our resort to reduce our environmental footprint.
